data.name: Skip Lake 2
data.detailed_description:
GAMES ON THE SAME TIMELINE

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1427400/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1570160/


About the Game

Skip Lake 2 is a minimalist and relaxing puzzle, set in a lake of crystal clear waters and musical rocks.




The sequel of Skip Lake, this game is now going a litlle deeper in the story, and bringing new mechanichs with unique puzzles!

The game captures the international game of skipping stones into the water, transforming it into a puzzle of logic and direction, with harmony of music and sound effects, carefully composed to relax.

Hit the pots trough stunning landscapes

Key Features


  • Touch the rotating pillars until they are at the right angle for the stone to hit until it reaches the pot on the other side of the lake !!

  • Contemplate minimalist art, with details that will delight your eyes.

  • Listen to the Harmony of music and sound effects, Composed carefully just to relax you.

  • Feel the tranquility of a rocky lake with crystal blue water.

  • Solve over 100 intriguing puzzles!

data.short_description: “Solve beautiful puzzles and listen to the melody of crashing Pots going deeper into the story of Skip Lake!”

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
